headline: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) Unveils AI-Powered Cooling Tech For Expanding Data Centers
summary: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) has launched the 3D TRASAR Technology for Direct-to-Chip Liquid Cooling, a significant innovation aimed at enhancing data center operations through real-time monitoring and AI integration. Over the past month, Ecolab's share price increased by 4%, aligning closely with the broader market's upward movement. This development likely added weight to the company's overall positive performance, alongside the opening of a new biotech laboratory and executive board appointments...

content.title: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) Unveils AI-Powered Cooling Tech For Expanding Data Centers
content.summary: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) has launched the 3D TRASAR Technology for Direct-to-Chip Liquid Cooling, a significant innovation aimed at enhancing data center operations through real-time monitoring and AI integration. This development likely added weight to the company's overall positive performance, alongside the opening of a new biotech laboratory and executive board appointments...

headline: Ecolab Launches New Solution to Revolutionize Data Center Performance Amidst AI Boom
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., June 03, 2025--Ecolab Inc., a global sustainability leader offering water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions and services, has announced the launch of a transformative technology to drive high-performance data center cooling. Ecolab’s new solution, 3D TRASAR Technology for Direct-to-Chip Liquid Cooling, helps protect data center servers by monitoring coolant health indicators in real time such as temperature, pH and flow rates. With this offering, Ecolab now covers the
